item.title: Customized Project Management Course
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Customized Project Management Courses

Apart from the certification courses where the course outline is fixed by the certification bodies, I also conduct need-based training courses for the organizations. Course outlines of these courses are drafted and finalized based on the need of the organization. If you are looking from an organizationâ€™s competency-building perspective then it is recommended you go for customized courses.
